channel.title: Please help!
channel.description:
i know how to add npc (::npc *) and to add items (::pickup * or ::item *) but how do i spawn objects (stairs, portals, drawers etc?
also whats ::pnpc?

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“Sunarpe, post:1, topic:370999”]i know how to add npc (::npc *) and to add items (::pickup * or ::item *) but how do i spawn objects (stairs, portals, drawers etc?

also whats ::pnpc?[/quote]

pnpc is a command many people add to their servers which turns their player into an npc of their choice

And adding objects usually isnt a command, but is rather handled in different places depending on how your server is packaged.

Provide more information in order for us to help,
What base are you on?

Read full topic
